entry.title: dotnet/announcements - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-06-24
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • .NET support for Windows 7 and 8.1 will end in January 2023 #226

entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-06-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [NativeAOT] Could not load ICU data. UErrorCode: 2 Abortado #71275
  • Segmentation fault in ilc when building native code for System.Reflection.Tests (NativeAOT, ARM64, Ubuntu 18.04) #71270
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: RuntimeHelpers.GetAssemblyFromRvaSpan API #71268
  • Do we still need [AggressiveOptimization] on so many methods? #71261
    7.0.0
  • NET 7.0-preview.5: Compatibility question #71259
  • Test failure: System.Tests.DoubleTests.AtanPiTest on Android #71252
  • SupportedPlatform calculation for platform compatibility analyzer is wrong #71251
    7.0.0
  • Try/catch blocks for ArrayPool in System.Security.Cryptography.HashAlgorithm #71249
  • Test failure BasicEventSourceTests.TestsManifestGeneration.Test_EventSource_EtwManifestGenerationRollover #71243
  • Test failure Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.Console.Test.ConsoleLoggerProcessorTests.ThrowDuringProcessLog_ShutsDownGracefully #71242
  • Test failure readytorun/tests/mainv2/mainv2.sh #71241

Closed

  • MemoryPool<byte>.Shared.MaxBufferSize seems incorrect #61560
    7.0.0
  • Add more Array.Sort test combinations, per #41234 #41376
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Expose method to get system message for system error code #67872
    7.0.0
  • ASP.NET 6 - Out of Memory Exception on App Service #71014
  • [wasm][aot] `RangeError: Maximum call stack size exceeded` in `System.Text.RegularExpressions.Tests` #61756
    7.0.0
  • NativeAOT failures - System.Tests.BinaryDataTests #71250
  • System.IO.Tests - massive failures on tvOS, iOS #71253
    7.0.0
  • Base64EncodeAndWrite uses stackalloc with the max stack size #71267
  • Test failure System.Diagnostics.Metrics.Tests.MetricEventSourceTests.EventSourceFiltersInstruments #67134
    7.0.0
  • Upgrade to .Net 6 from .Net 5 breaks authentication to oData-Webservice #71138
  • `Process.Modules` is unable to list 32-bit modules of a target process on Windows #70370
    7.0.0
  • Publish CoreCLR test drop as a NuGet package #4821
    Future
  • `-p:NativeLib=Shared` to be implied in the absence of NativeLib #69369
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Add test coverage for generic type substitution with byreflike generics #71276
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Redo minor cleanups in System.Runtime.Numerics #71274
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Disable HANDLER_ENTRY_MUST_BE_IN_HOT_SECTION #71273
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm][debugger] ]Fix firefox tests #71272
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Cross module take3 #71271
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • [Mono] Fix all remaining C4018 warnings and enable the check during build #71269
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Add annotations for ref fields to public API surface #71265
    area-Meta, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Support top-level statements in regex analyzer #71264
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, community-contribution
  • Add an ETW event for reporting some internal JIT data back #71263
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Try adding armv8-a+lse #71260
  • Implement ICorProfilerInfo13 to support object handle creation/destruction/access #71257
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • #71252 disable AtanPiTest for android x86 #71256
  • Add markdown readme for System.Collections.Immutable #71247
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • JIT: fix double reporting of some GC frame slots #71245
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add stateless shape support for caller-allocated buffer and guaranteed unmarshal #71244
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0
  • Exposing static bool IsTypeSupported { get; } on Vector<T> and Vector64/128/256<T> #71240
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation

Merged

  • Fix MemoryPool<byte>.Shared.MaxBufferSize seems incorrect #61755
    area-System.Buffers
  • Add more array.sort test combination #68489
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • disable test Invoke_Instance_And_Static_Method_Win32_Process on Windows 11 #71152
    area-System.Management
  • [release/7.0-preview6] Add annotations for ref fields to public API surface #71266
    Servicing-approved, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Implement `Marshal.Get(Last)PInvokeErrorMessage()` APIs. #70685
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Use IndexOfAnyExcept in a few more places #71146
    area-Meta
  • Remove SString ANSI representation. #71186
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [wasm][aot] Enabling `System.Text.RegularExpressions.Tests` #71126
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-AOT-mono, 7.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Fixing entrypoint breakpoint on release mode. #71235
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Adding tests for Atan2Pi #71206
    area-System.Numerics
  • Separate out char marshalling rules to a separate MarshallingGeneratorFactory. #71028
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Mark EnumerateMetafileProc's callbackData parameter as nullable #71239
    area-System.Drawing, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Disable System.Memory.Data tests for NativeAOT #71262
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • disable ExtractToFile_SpecialFile_Unelevated_Throws for tvOS #71258
    area-System.IO, 7.0.0
  • don't start new processes on iOS and tvOS (it's not supported) #71254
    area-System.IO, 7.0.0
  • Update MetricEventSourceTests.cs #70586
    area-System.Diagnostics.Metric
  • Fix documentation of BitDecrement #70519
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Add IAsyncEnumerable support to TransformManyBlock #49264
    area-System.Threading.Tasks, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] Switch default modules to es6 #70746
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • Remove gather-write overload of QuicStream.WriteAsync #71204
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Net.Quic
  • Fix 32-bit process module enumeration on 64-bit Windows (#70370) #71218
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Add SYSLIB0044 to diagnostic list #71232
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • Set NativeLib=Shared for classlib by default #70879
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/7.0-preview6] Fix size check for objects in heap walk #71183
    Servicing-approved, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 7.0.0

Updated

  • Added snake and kebab naming policies to JSON serializer #69613
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [Draft] idea how to improve allocations when serializing primitive types #67223
    area-System.Xml, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Improve `CreateDirectory` on Windows #66754
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Fix SerialPort memory leak when requests time out and no data is received #68014
    area-System.IO, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • Optimized string.Replace(char, char) #67049
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Removed JIT (uint) cast workaround to elide bound-checks in CoreLib #67448
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Update DependencyGraphViewer to allow for DGML reading #70690
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Try getting a crashdump for #70010 #71177
    NO-MERGE, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Custom marshallers v2 usage #71238
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0
  • [API Implementation]: SafeFileHandle overloads for SetCreationTime, SetLastAccessTime, SetLastWriteTime #60507
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • [Draft] Implement Tar async APIs #70574
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Enable AES encryption on Browser WASM #70915
    area-System.Security, cryptographic-docs-impact
  • Make the archives created on Unix have the read permissions by default #70735
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution
  • Refactor segment size computation #71178
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Recursive validation #67810
    area-System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations, community-contribution
  • Nullable annotations for System.Security.Cryptography.Xml #67198
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • Added a new method to the GC API to Get the GC Configurations #70514
    area-GC-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Re-enable automatic gc safe transitions in threaded wasm mode #71229
    arch-wasm, area-GC-mono, area-Threading-mono
  • [WIP] Adjust regions range dynamically based on memory limits #71164
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Enable hot/cold splitting of EH funclets #71236
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Enable string properties evaluation of Length and Char[]. #67028
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [wasm]: JavaScript interop with [JSImport] and [JSExport] attributes and Roslyn #66304
    arch-wasm, new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • ARM64 - Allow double constants to CSE more often #65176
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Fixing the handling of Positive NaN in Math.Min for float/double #70865
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Numerics, 6.0.8
  • Implement NarrowUtf16ToAscii for AArch64 #70080
    area-System.Text.Encoding, community-contribution
  • PGO: Add new tiers #70941
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Fix for #70007, fallback to old implementation if optimized way fails #70073
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, community-contribution
  • JIT: Remove some arm64 hwintrinsic asserts #70557
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, no-recent-activity, needs-author-action
  • Optimise `LastIndexOfAnyExcept` #69261
    area-System.Memory, tenet-performance, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • [wasm][debugger] Enable onCallFrame evaluation of static fields in classes/interfaces from a static method. #70560
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, 7.0.0
  • Disable LTCG when building libnethost.lib for Windows. #71089
    area-Host, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Obsolete Create(string) cryptographic factory methods #71230
    area-System.Security, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • [wasm-mt] Add MessageChannel between browser thread and new pthreads #70908
    arch-wasm, area-Threading-mono, 7.0.0
  • Use locateFile to resolve path for assets outside of remoteSources #69441
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, community-contribution
  • Unix: Move 'FileNotFound to DirectoryNotFound' handling to GetExceptionForIoErrno. #70661
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Optimize `HashCode.AddBytes` for inputs larger than 16 bytes. #70095
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Delete dead code from and fix `getSIMDStructFromField` #71226
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add `System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat.Heif` and `Webp`. #71227
    area-System.Drawing, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Move macOS remote unwinding to libunwind directory #69720
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [wasm][nodejs] Fix console template running with node, to always flush the output stream before exit #70704
    test-failure, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Bring Enum.InternalBoxEnum to C# (CoreCLR) #70181
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [NativeAOT] thread suspension on Unix #71187
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [mono][wasm] Add a minimal version of gsharedvt for llvmonly, enabled… #70867
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Add CET pipeline #71223
  • NonBacktracking locking fixes and cleanup #71234
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Fix incorrect BigInteger multiply result for -a * a #69982
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Annotate collections.specialized to be native aot compatible #71159
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-06-24
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • [API Compat] Add rule to make sure virtual modifier is not removed #18682
    7.0.1xx

Updated

  • [API Compat] add rule to make sure parameter names don't change #23908
  • Turn PackageValidation on by default #23910
  • clarify API Compatibility rules for virtual keyword #26169
  • Breaking change in response file parsing #26026
  • [API Compat] Add rule to prohibit making a member virtual #18683
    7.0.1xx
  • dotnet-sdk installed with snap crashes on Ubuntu 21.04 #18249

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix a typo #26244
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Nagilson pr2linux #26242
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'main' #26235
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • add rules to catch addition or removal of 'virtual' modifier #25734
    Area-Compatibility
  • Bump Newtonsoft.Json from 9.0.1 to 13.0.1 in /src/Assets/TestProjects/CompilationContext/TestApp #26164
    Area-Infrastructure, dependencies
  • Bump Newtonsoft.Json from 9.0.1 to 13.0.1 in /src/Assets/TestProjects/KitchenSink/TestLibrary #26162
    Area-Infrastructure, dependencies
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'main' #26218
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Support workload pack groups for repair, download, and show URL operations #25829
  • Revert to token-per-line response file handling #26204
    Area-Infrastructure, Area-CLI, cli-ux
  • Allow Opt-In to change the default to Release for Pack/Pub #25991
    Area-NetSDK
  • MSBuild server V2 #26104
    Area-CLI
  • Bump NewtonSoft.Json from 9.0.1 to 13.0.1 in /src/Assets/TestProjects/NewtonSoftDependentProject #26171
    Area-Infrastructure, dependencies
  • Bump Newtonsoft.Json from 9.0.1 to 13.0.1 in /src/Assets/TestProjects/SimpleDependencies #26165
    Area-Infrastructure, dependencies

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-06-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Make ChangeSignature command handler asynchronous and avoid expensive semantic operations on UI thread #62135
  • Enable updated escape rules if `System.Runtime.CompilerServices.RuntimeFeature.ByRefFields` exists #62131
  • It seems like a syntax parser bug when combined `switch` statement and a wrong open square bracket `[` token #62126
    17.3
  • Report error if LifetimeAnnotationAttribute is used directly in source #62124
  • `UseSimpleUsingStatement` produces bad indentation #62123
  • Dereference of ref field should be emitted to IL even if value is ignored #62122
    17.4
  • PEFieldSymbol in VisualBasic should set RefKind and RefCustomModifiers for ref fields or include use-site diagnostic #62121
    17.4
  • Support ref field assignment in object initializers #62120
    17.4

Closed

  • Local functions don't give unreachability diagnostics #58304
    17.3
  • Add EditAndContinueMethodDebugInformation.Create overload that takes compressedStateMachineStateMap #61636
    17.3
  • Certain intermixes of braceless and braced usings seems to result in unbalanced try/finally sequence points #61119
    17.3
  • SourceGenerators Long Path issue when building in VS #48833
    17.3
  • resolve PROTOTYPE comments regarding target-typed conditional expression #46171
    17.3
  • Using a custom Interpolated String handler for logging may skip side effects #62128
  • Surface unused referenced assemblies to user as diagnostics #625
    Backlog
  • Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.CSharp.UnitTests.AttributeTests_CallerInfoAttributes.TestCallerFilePath2 is failing for CoreCLR in DefaultInterfaceImplementation branch possibly due to behavior change in CoreCLR #25882
    Compiler.Next
  • CodeLens showing incorrect user as author #62125
  • Wrong behavior of compiling for functions with nullable string return when nullable is enabled #62115

PullRequests

Created

  • [WIP] improve test partitioning #62138
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Handle possible null symbols in `getAttributeTarget` #62137
    Area-Compilers
  • Separate out connection failures #62136
    Area-Compilers, Area-Infrastructure
  • Move to a shared stopwatch in the incremental generator #62134
    Area-Compilers
  • Pool arrays in the incremental generator #62132
    Area-Compilers
  • Allow to forward obsolete types without any diagnostics. #62127
    Area-Compilers
  • Exclude BCL libraries from Roslyn vsix #62119
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add members to PythiaCompletionProviderBase to move IntelliCode off internal APIs #62118
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #62130
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Revert "Merge pull request #61669 from jasonmalinowski/log-aggregator… #62056
    Area-IDE, Next

Updated

  • Update tests to reflect BCL behavior changes #61456
    Area-Compilers
  • Avoid cascading diagnostics on error base type #62087
    Area-Compilers
  • Address PROTOTYPE comments in features/ref-fields #62088
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • testing out caching common binary assets #62095
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Fix top-level activation for Move Static Members #62103
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Give member refactoring tools consistent field selection #62102
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Fix NRE in VisualBasicAddExplicitCastCodeFixProvider #62075
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Don't load parts early from MEF that aren't needed #62090
    Area-IDE
  • Allow `delegate*<...>? ` to be scanned/parsed and add diagnostic to binder #62104
    Area-Compilers
  • Document Outline Feature #61784
    Area-IDE
  • Assert diagnostics pass correct number of arguments #59419
    Area-Analyzers, Community
  • Issue/50181 #62101
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Add prefer trailing commas code-style option #54859
    Area-IDE
  • changes needed to build Roslyn.sln on unix #61959
  • Reuse incremental states from prior runs if they are unchanged #62116
    Area-Compilers
  • Verify files are saved after a save operation #62117
    Area-IDE
  • Support switch expression in CompleteStatementHandler #62114
    Area-IDE
  • Add `CompilerGeneratedAttribute` to `EqualityContract` property #61993
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Add elastic space in IDE0063 codefix #59383
    Area-IDE, Community
  • [EnC] Allow deleting method #61806
    Area-Compilers

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-06-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • CryptographicException on ProtectedBrowserStorage.GetAsync #42418
  • Blazor WASM Hosted App Running Without Server Gets Ambiguous Error #42416
  • Change DefaultFiles/DirectoryBrowser/StaticFileMiddleware to only no-op if there's an active endpoint with a non-null RequestDelegate #42413
  • ASP.NET Core 6 MVC CSS Isolation Breaks When RazorRuntimeCompilation Enabled #42411
  • Building assets using MSBuild & NPM needs further clarification #42409
  • Ready repository with an example WebAssemblyPrerendered and Razor Pages #42408
  • Swagger method with empty body for grpc get request #42407
  • Blazor WASM Template tests are too long #42406
  • A11y_.NET Core_ASP.NETCore_Manageyouraccounttwofactor_NonTextContrast: The Color contrast ratio of the focus indicator of the "Set up Authenticator app" and "Reset Authenticator app" button is less than 3:1. #42401
    7.0-preview7
  • A11y_.NET Core_ASP.NETCore_Manageyouraccountprofile_NonTextContrast: The Color contrast ratio of the focus indicator of the "Save" button is less than 3:1. #42399
    7.0-preview7
  • A11y_.NET Core_ASP.NETCore_AngularRegister_NonTextContrast: The Color contrast ratio of the focus indicator of the "Register" button is less than 3:1. #42398
    7.0-preview7
  • A11y_.NET Core_ASP.NETCore_WebAppMVCRegister_NonTextContrast: The Color contrast ratio of the focus indicator of the "Email", "Password", "Confirm password" and "Register" button is less than 3:1. #42397
    7.0-preview7
  • A11y_.NET Core_ASP.NETCore_WebAppLogin_ScreenReader: NVDA is not announcing the status message after login with invalid attempt. #42396
    7.0-preview7
  • A11y_.NET Core_ASP.NETCore_WebAppRegister_NonTextContrast: The Color contrast ratio of the focus indicator of the "Email", "Password", "Confirm password" and "Register" button is less than 3:1. #42395
    7.0-preview7
  • signalr data deposition #42402
  • ARM64/ANCM cleanup work #42393
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Need a helix queue for ARM64 for IIS ARM64 coverage #42392
    7.0.0
  • Document macOS OID change #42391
    7.0-preview7

Closed

  • Incorrect logger EventName for shutdown event in Hosting #42360
    7.0-preview7
  • Flaky test: Templates.Test.WorkerTemplateTest.WorkerTemplateAsync #25404
    Test failures
  • Validation for MetadataType #39938
    Discussions
  • Two scroll bars appear at 400% zoom on the page. #42361
  • `dotnet new blazorwasm --exclude-launch-settings` doesn't exclude launchsettings.json #42331
    7.0-preview7
  • Blazor, during the first visit, the page loads twice #42400
  • A11y_.NET Core_ASP.NETCore_ReactLogin_DevTools: The role is not defined for "Remember me" checkbox on the login page. #42342
    7.0-preview7
  • Update negotiate auth to replace reflection with new public API #42323
    7.0-preview7
  • [Migration] Support sharing auth state with "backend" System.Web app #40083
    .NET 7 Planning
  • ARM64 support for ASP.NET Core on IIS (ANCM) #39281
    7.0-preview6
  • can't deploy .net 7 preview 5 to iis(win server2012) #42274

PullRequests

Created

  • Add `blazorwasm` Template Baseline Tests #42420
    area-mvc
  • Small test assert changes for flaky tests #42419
    area-runtime
  • Make RateLimitingMiddleware endpoint aware #42417
  • Allow file middlewares to run if there's an endpoint with a null request delegate #42415
    area-runtime

Merged

  • Fix event name for the shutdown event in hosting #42414
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview7
  • Bump got from 11.8.3 to 11.8.5 in /src/ProjectTemplates/test/Templates.Tests #42405
    area-mvc, javascript, feature-blazor-native-dependencies, 7.0-preview7
  • Unquarantine WorkerTemplate test #42412
    area-mvc, 7.0-preview7
  • Unquarantine + extra #42410
    7.0-preview7
  • Update nuget dependencies #42375
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview7
  • Update `dotnet new blazorwasm --exclude-launch-settings` to exclude launchSettings.json #42379
    area-blazor, 7.0-preview7
  • Missing checked in code for templates #42386
    area-mvc, 7.0-preview7
  • Quarantining failing HTTP3 tests #42390
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview7
  • Use new NegotiateAuthentication API instead of reflection of internal API #42364
    area-security, community-contribution, 7.0-preview7
  • Update SDK #41798
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview7

Updated

  • Use GetFolderPath(UserProfile) to obtain HOME dir #41865
    area-dataprotection, area-runtime, community-contribution
  • [WIP] Adding the rest of WebTransport into Kestrel #42097
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview7
  • Implement analyzer that suggests using builder.Services to ConfigureServices method #42356
    area-infrastructure
  • Implement analyzer to favor using builder.Logging over ConfigureLogging #42354
    area-infrastructure
  • [Blazor] Unquarantine component E2E tests that were quarantined because of an SDK issue #41494
    area-blazor
  • Implementing analyzer to prefer WebApplicationBuilder.Configuration over Configure methods #42351
  • macOS dev-certs overhaul #42251
    area-commandlinetools, feature-devcerts, blog-candidate
  • Adding ProblemDetailsService #42384
    area-web-frameworks
  • Introducing `I*HttpResult` interfaces #42385
    area-web-frameworks
  • Update newtonsoft.json dependency #42377
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 3.1.x
  • [release/7.0-preview6] Backport custom HTML elements rendering Blazor components #42383
    Servicing-approved, area-blazor

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-06-24

Issues

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-06-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • XmlSerializer Creation throws FileNotFoundException #8322
  • SwipeItem command not executed #8315
  • Editor Sizing Options Do Not Work on Android #8313
  • Android Switch Issue (App ThemeBinding wont update) #8312
  • Shell Flyout is Blank When Entry is Clicked First #8311
  • Button Pressed VisualState not Reverting #8309
  • Can't enable Keychain on entitlements.plist #8308
  • [Blazor] Update templates to include a message in the app when the browser version is too old #8307
  • Shell badges #8305
  • Can't publish a Maui app that references a class library on Windows without modifying the project #8304
  • [Android] [Entry] Keyboard is still shown after return/done action #8302
  • .net Maui iOS BundleResource Missing / Not Working #8301
  • Single project iOS Service Extensions #8299
  • ContentPage's OnBackButtonPressed not invoked on iOS and MacCatalyst #8296
  • Can't Change ToolbarItem FontIconSource Glyph After Load #8295

Closed

  • ChainReact.NET: Low-code reactivity framework for .NET #8320

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-06-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Interception for DbUpdateConcurrencyException #28315
    7.0.0
  • ExecuteScalarAsync doesn't throw exception when you supply violation of foreign key with ' returning *' at the end of it #28314
  • Update ASP.Net tests #28313
  • Why does Npgsql join the same table multiple times on the same key #28312
  • Intermittent Behavior With Linq .Any() / AnyAsync() #28311
  • Sum in GroupBy fails with Cannot perform an aggregate function on an expression containing an aggregate or a subquery #28310
  • GroupBy with to-many relation leads to exception and overly complex SQL (regression since 6.0.2) #28309
  • Allow passing in other arguments to msbuild when building project with dotnet ef. #28306

Closed

  • VS2022 .NET 6.0 Scaffold-DbContext command error: Invalid column name for non-existent column 'is_sparse' #28301
  • Revert update of Microsoft.Data.SqlClient to 5.0.0-preview3.22168.1 #28293
    7.0.0
  • OnConfiguring when parametrized Constructor is used #28286
  • EF fails to add "Initial" migration #28280
  • What does the time in Cosmos EF log entries represent? #28243
  • Type Error: Select null att Union select '6A009AF8-EB56-400F-8947-9084ABCC3FE7' att #28224
  • problem with Json filed and ef core 5 #28157
  • Duplicates returned when using AsNoTracking #28288
  • Switch to Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.CSharp 4.2.0 and unskip suppressor tests #27895
    7.0.0
  • Error operating associated entity #28299

PullRequests

Merged

  • Unskip NRT suppression tests #28308
    auto-merge
  • Update to .NET SDK 7 Preview 5 #28303
  • Add entity splitting support to migration snapshot #28302

Updated

  • Json Columns initial work #28171
  • Add support for CSharpHelper for List literals #28212
  • Interceptor for DbUpdateConcurrencyException #28305
    providers-beware
  • New ChangeTracker events #28297
